title: Walter Johnson Portrait with incredible eye appeal $600 obo
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Walter Johnson Portrait with incredible eye appeal $600 obo
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Looking to move this WaJo to a new home.  Examples with a front this nice don't seem to come to market very often.  I have had this one for close to 5 years.  The front has a couple wrinkles that can only be seen when you tilt the card to the perfect angle in the right light.  So, not perfect, but pretty damn close.

$600 obo

Shipping is on me.  Please let me know if you'd also like insurance (I will charge you the exact amount).

If you claim it for the full $600, it is yours. 

I will accept offers until tomorrow morning, and then take the best one tomorrow.  Thanks for looking!
